title: Leaverbuster
body:
Will I get leaverbuster if I get disconnected from my game and cant join because of my internet.
I don't think its fair for us cause if I get disconnected from the game its the internet connections fault and we have to wait 20 minutes before 5 games and then 1 internet screw up gets us more leaverbusters?
And plus there are those moments where you HAVE to go to something all of a sudden because of your parents or it could be something serious even like a funeral. 
For some points I don't think this is fair but on other points it seems fair.
